newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Nov 11.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Nov 11.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Um Al-Qura Company buys 1,000 buses worth $85 million from Al-Naghi Motor Co to be used during the haj pilgrimage season.
- Prince Abdullah meets Chinese delegation; discuss boosting trade between the two countries.
- A slight rise in share trading on the Saudi stock market on Sunday, with banking shares most in demand. REUTERS
